data.title: Bonanza Mining Sets March 3 Effective Date for One-for-Three Share Consolidation
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An update from Bonanza Mining Corporation ( (TSE:BNZ) ) is now available.

Bonanza Mining Corporation will implement a one-for-three share consolidation effective at the market open on March 3, 2026, following acceptance from the TSX Venture Exchange. The company’s name and BNZ ticker will remain unchanged, with new ISIN and CUSIP identifiers assigned to reflect the post-consolidation structure.

The consolidation will reduce the number of issued and outstanding shares from 67,056,202 to approximately 22,352,067, while proportionally adjusting the terms of all outstanding stock options and warrants. Approved by the board under the company’s Articles and By-Laws, the move is intended to streamline Bonanza’s capital structure and may influence trading dynamics and investor perception of the stock on the TSX Venture Exchange.

More about Bonanza Mining Corporation

Bonanza Mining Corporation is a Vancouver-based mining company listed on the TSX Venture Exchange under the symbol BNZ. The company operates in the mineral exploration and mining sector, with its shares trading in Canada and a shareholder base subject to TSX-V regulatory oversight.

Average Trading Volume: 34,428

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: C$2.57M

For a thorough assessment of BNZ stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Popular Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend, Signals Ongoing Strength
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An announcement from Popular ( (BPOP) ) is now available.

On February 26, 2026, Popular, Inc. announced that its board of directors approved a quarterly cash dividend of $0.75 per share on its outstanding common stock. The dividend is scheduled to be paid on April 1, 2026 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 18, 2026, signaling continued capital return to investors and underscoring the bank’s confidence in its financial position and earnings resilience.

The dividend declaration maintains Popular’s pattern of shareholder distributions and provides income visibility to investors in a period of ongoing scrutiny of bank capital and payout policies. For stakeholders, the move suggests management sees sufficient balance sheet strength to support both regulatory requirements and consistent cash returns, reinforcing the company’s standing among leading regional banking institutions.

The most recent analyst rating on (BPOP) stock is a Buy with a $170.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Popular stock, see the BPOP Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on BPOP Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, BPOP is a Outperform.

The score is driven primarily by strong underlying financial performance and attractive valuation (low P/E with a solid dividend). Earnings-call guidance supports continued improvement and capital returns, but near-term technicals are mixed and cash-flow quality and funding/credit headwinds temper the outlook.

To see Spark’s full report on BPOP stock, click here.

More about Popular

Popular, Inc. (NASDAQ: BPOP) is the leading financial institution by assets and deposits in Puerto Rico and ranks among the top 50 U.S. bank holding companies by assets. Through its principal subsidiary Banco Popular de Puerto Rico, it offers retail, mortgage and commercial banking, leasing, broker-dealer and insurance services in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands, and operates Popular Bank branches in New York, New Jersey and Florida.

Popular, Inc. is a diversified banking group with a strong Caribbean footprint and a growing U.S. mainland presence. Its operations span consumer and commercial lending, deposit services and financial intermediation, positioning the company as a key regional player in both Puerto Rico’s financial sector and selected U.S. metropolitan markets.

Average Trading Volume: 574,050

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: $9.35B

data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Aker BP ASA ( (GB:0M5J) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Aker BP ASA has published its financial calendar, detailing key reporting and governance dates for 2025 and 2026. The schedule outlines when investors can expect the annual report, quarterly and half-yearly results, and the annual general meeting, providing greater visibility for stakeholders and aligning with continuing obligations for timely market disclosure.

For the 2025 financial year, the company plans to release its annual report on March 27, 2026. For the 2026 financial year, it will hold its annual general meeting in April and issue first-quarter, half-year, and third-quarter reports across May, July, and October, supporting transparency and planning for analysts and shareholders.

The most recent analyst rating on (GB:0M5J) stock is a Hold with a NOK280.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Aker BP ASA stock, see the GB:0M5J Stock Forecast page.

More about Aker BP ASA

Aker BP ASA is a Norwegian oil and gas exploration and production company focused on offshore operations on the Norwegian Continental Shelf. The company plays a significant role in the Nordic energy sector, supplying hydrocarbons to regional and international markets and operating within strict regulatory and reporting frameworks.

data.title: Innventure Advances Sustainable Packaging with Aveda AeroFlexx Deal
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An update from Innventure ( (INV) ) is now available.

On February 26, 2026, AeroFlexx announced that Aveda will become the first prestige beauty brand to globally adopt its curbside recyclable refill packaging, marking a significant commercial milestone for both companies. The collaboration will launch with select best-selling Aveda products beginning early next year, positioning AeroFlexx’s lightweight, airframe refill format as a premium, consumer-friendly solution that uses up to 70% less plastic than conventional Aveda bottles and aligns with Aveda’s long-standing sustainability and circularity commitments.

By integrating AeroFlexx technology into its portfolio, Aveda reinforces its reputation for environmental leadership in beauty while setting a new benchmark for how major brands can reduce plastic and improve user experience simultaneously. For AeroFlexx and parent Innventure, the global prestige rollout enhances industry visibility and underscores the company’s role in driving sustainable packaging innovation that could influence broader adoption across personal care and adjacent sectors.

The most recent analyst rating on (INV) stock is a Hold with a $3.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Innventure stock, see the INV Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on INV Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, INV is a Neutral.

Overall score is held down primarily by very weak financial performance (large losses, negative margins, and weak cash flow) and a bearish technical setup (below major moving averages with negative MACD). Positive corporate events around fundraising and debt reduction provide some offset, but valuation is difficult to support given ongoing losses.

To see Spark’s full report on INV stock, click here.

More about Innventure

Innventure subsidiary AeroFlexx is a liquid packaging company providing integrated, end-to-end solutions across categories including personal care, household products, baby care, pet care, food, and industrial applications. Its proprietary technology blends flexible and rigid formats into customizable primary and refill packaging, emphasizing sustainability and enhanced consumer experience across North America, Europe, and Southeast Asia.

AeroFlexx is positioned as a sustainability-driven packaging leader, supplying innovative, curbside-recyclable formats that reduce plastic usage and support brand value for partners such as prestige beauty companies. As part of the Innventure family, the company focuses on scalable, environmentally focused packaging technologies that cater to global brands seeking to lower their packaging impact while maintaining premium performance and design standards.

Average Trading Volume: 1,721,468

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: $259.7M

See more insights into INV stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Zoomcar Holdings Completes Private Warrant Financing Round
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Zoomcar Holdings ( (ZCAR) ) has issued an update.

On February 25, 2026, Zoomcar Holdings closed a previously announced private placement of 939 common stock purchase warrants to verified accredited investors, raising gross proceeds of about $939 with no placement agent or commissions. The warrants, each exercisable for one share of common stock at an initial exercise price of $6,000, include standard anti-dilution adjustments and ownership caps that limit any holder’s stake to 4.99%, or up to 9.99% at the investor’s election, reflecting a modest capital raise structured to manage dilution and concentration risk for existing shareholders.

The transaction, launched on February 19, 2026 and announced via press release on February 26, 2026, was conducted under Section 4(a)(2) and Rule 506(c) of Regulation D, with Zoomcar verifying all purchasers as accredited investors. As the warrants and underlying shares were sold in a private, unregistered offering and remain subject to transfer restrictions, the move signals a targeted approach to capital formation that preserves regulatory flexibility while potentially altering the company’s future capital structure if the warrants are eventually exercised.

The most recent analyst rating on (ZCAR) stock is a Hold with a $0.07 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Zoomcar Holdings stock, see the ZCAR Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on ZCAR Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, ZCAR is a Neutral.

The score is held down primarily by very weak financial strength (deeply negative equity, sizable leverage vs assets, and negative/weak cash flow), which outweighs the TTM revenue rebound and improved gross/EBIT margins. Technicals add pressure due to a pronounced downtrend and negative MACD, while valuation inputs are not usable (P/E shown as 0 and no dividend yield), limiting support from that component.

To see Spark’s full report on ZCAR stock, click here.

More about Zoomcar Holdings

Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Bengaluru, India, Zoomcar Holdings, Inc. operates India’s largest peer-to-peer, self-drive car-sharing marketplace. The company runs a digital platform that connects vehicle owners as Hosts with Guests seeking flexible, access-based mobility through a wide range of cars offered at affordable prices.

Average Trading Volume: 33,851

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: $536.4K

data.title: Havila Kystruten lifts earnings, secures long-term financing and books strong 2026 demand
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Havila Kystruten AS ( (DE:6FZ0) ) just unveiled an update.

Havila Kystruten reported its second full year with all four vessels in operation, delivering 100% fleet uptime in 2025 and sharply improved financial performance, with EBITDA rising to MNOK 373 from a loss two years earlier. Revenue grew 17% to MNOK 1,775 on higher average cabin rates and solid demand, though fourth-quarter earnings were weighed by lower occupancy linked to a delayed sales campaign and heavier marketing spend aimed at boosting future bookings.

Operating expenses increased 7% as the company expanded its onshore organisation and stepped up sales and marketing, while renegotiated bunkering agreements and LNG price movements helped contain fuel and port costs. A major debt refinancing of MEUR 456 secured 15-year vessel financing, cut the effective interest cost to about 10%, and improved financial flexibility even as reported accounting equity remained negative due to currency effects, contrasted with positive value-adjusted equity based on vessel market values.

On the sustainability front, Havila Kystruten reduced CO2 emissions 36% versus its 2017 coastal route baseline and completed its first climate-neutral voyage using liquefied biogas and large battery packs, achieving about 92% lifecycle CO2 cuts and eliminating local NOx and SOx emissions on that trip. With 63% of 2026 capacity already booked as of February and cabin-night bookings nearly 20% above the prior year, management expects continued revenue growth and margin improvement supported by the 2025 investments in marketing, sales and organisational capabilities.

More about Havila Kystruten AS

Havila Kystruten AS operates four modern cruise-passenger vessels along the Norwegian coastal route, combining government-contracted coastal transport with commercial passenger services and onboard sales. The company focuses on yield management, sustainable operations using LNG and biogas, and long-term growth in the Norwegian coastal tourism and transport market.

Average Trading Volume: 8,081

Current Market Cap: NOK921M

Find detailed analytics on 6FZ0 stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Western Copper and Gold Raises $92 Million in Bought Deal to Advance Yukon Casino Project
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Western Copper ( (TSE:WRN) ) has issued an announcement.

On February 26, 2026, Western Copper and Gold completed a bought deal public offering of 22,169,125 common shares at $4.15 each, raising gross proceeds of about $92 million, including full exercise of the over-allotment option. The syndicate of underwriters, led by Stifel Nicolaus Canada Inc. and including several major Canadian investment dealers, received a 5% cash commission on most of the offering, while a reduced commission applied to shares sold via a president’s list.

The company plans to use the net proceeds primarily to advance permitting and engineering activities at its flagship Casino Project in the Yukon, with the balance earmarked for general corporate and working capital needs. Insider participation by a director and an officer, totaling 80,500 shares and $334,075 in proceeds, was treated as a related-party transaction under Canadian securities rules but remained below thresholds requiring a formal valuation or minority shareholder approval, signaling board support for the financing structure without triggering additional governance processes.

The most recent analyst rating on (TSE:WRN) stock is a Buy with a C$7.50 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Western Copper stock, see the TSE:WRN Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on TSE:WRN Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, TSE:WRN is a Neutral.

The score is held down primarily by weak financial performance (no revenue, ongoing losses, and sustained negative operating/free cash flow). This is partly offset by a strong, low-debt balance sheet and supportive technical momentum (price above key moving averages with positive MACD). Valuation provides limited support given the negative P/E and no dividend yield.

To see Spark’s full report on TSE:WRN stock, click here.

More about Western Copper

Western Copper and Gold Corporation is a Canadian mining company focused on the exploration and development of copper and gold assets. Its key growth project is the Casino Project in the Yukon, where it is advancing permitting and engineering work as it seeks to position itself within the North American copper and gold development pipeline.

Average Trading Volume: 440,571

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: C$949.7M

data.title: Fidia Expands Share Capital After New Bond Conversion by GGHL
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Fidia Spa ( (IT:FDA) ) has provided an announcement.

Fidia S.p.A. announced that Global Growth Holding Limited has converted four bonds from the second tranche of its reserved convertible cum warrant bond loan, at a price of €0.09 per share, into 444,444 new Fidia shares. The new shares are admitted directly to trading on the regulated market under the existing prospectus, further advancing the company’s ongoing capital strengthening process.

Following this conversion, the POC bond loan has been subscribed for a nominal €500,000, and the related capital increase has reached €440,000, with six bonds still subscribed but not yet converted. As a result, Fidia’s share capital rises by €40,000 to €10,287,761.90, and the total number of shares increases to 35,076,261, modestly diluting existing shareholders while providing additional financial resources for the company’s operations and growth plans.

The most recent analyst rating on (IT:FDA) stock is a Sell with a EUR0.11 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Fidia Spa stock, see the IT:FDA Stock Forecast page.

More about Fidia Spa

Fidia S.p.A., based in Turin and listed on Euronext Milan, is a leading developer of numerical control technology and integrated high-performance milling systems. With more than 40 years of experience and about 135 employees, the group focuses on solutions for complex shape milling, serving primarily the automotive mould sector and the aerospace industry with numerical controls, high-speed milling machines and CAM software.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Sell

data.title: BlackRock Marginally Reduces Stake in BAWAG Group
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

The latest update is out from BAWAG Group AG ( (DE:0B2) ).

BlackRock, Inc. has notified BAWAG Group AG that its aggregate holding of voting rights in the Austrian bank has fallen slightly, dropping below a previously reported level. As of 23 February 2026, BlackRock controls 4.98% of BAWAG’s voting rights via shares and a further 0.44% through financial instruments, for a total of 5.42%.

The move, disclosed under Austrian transparency rules, reflects a marginal reduction from BlackRock’s prior 5.52% position and signals ongoing portfolio adjustments by one of the world’s largest asset managers. While the change is modest, it is relevant for investors monitoring BAWAG’s free float structure and the influence of major institutional shareholders on the bank’s governance and market liquidity.

The most recent analyst rating on (DE:0B2) stock is a Buy with a EUR156.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on BAWAG Group AG stock, see the DE:0B2 Stock Forecast page.

More about BAWAG Group AG

BAWAG Group AG is an Austria-based banking group headquartered in Vienna and listed on the Vienna Stock Exchange. The group provides retail, corporate, and financial markets banking services, focusing on the Austrian market and select Western European countries. Its shares trade under the ISIN AT0000BAWAG2, reflecting its positioning as a listed European financial institution.

Average Trading Volume: 122,420

Current Market Cap: €10.08B

data.title: Avalon GloboCare Joins AMD AI Developer Program
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

An update from Avalon GloboCare ( (ALBT) ) is now available.

On February 26, 2026, Avalon GloboCare said it had been accepted into Advanced Micro Devices’ AI Developer Program, giving it access to AMD Developer Cloud credits, high-performance compute resources, tools, and training to support AI development. The program is expected to enhance model training efficiency, inference speed, and scalability for large language and multimodal systems used by Avalon Quantum AI, the subsidiary driving Avalon’s automated commentary video, documentation, and workflow automation platforms.

Avalon plans to use these AMD resources to scale its AI-driven media infrastructure, including automated, evidence-constrained commentary video generation, AI-assisted drafting for public company communications, and enterprise-grade compliance and workflow automation. Management framed the move as reinforcing Avalon Quantum AI’s technical capabilities and supporting the company’s ongoing strategic repositioning as a technology-focused AI player in media production and enterprise applications, potentially strengthening its competitive position in next-generation AI content and automation markets.

More about Avalon GloboCare

Avalon GloboCare Corp. is a technology-focused company developing and acquiring innovative artificial intelligence platforms, with a core emphasis on automated video generation, enterprise documentation, and workflow automation through its AI-driven subsidiary Avalon Quantum AI LLC. The company also maintains an intellectual property portfolio in cellular therapy and generative AI publishing and software, and markets the KetoAir breathalyzer, a U.S. FDA-registered Class I medical device for which it plans additional diagnostic applications.

Average Trading Volume: 281,934

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: $2.28M

Learn more about ALBT stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.
